title: StubHub
description: StubHub's brand colors consist of shades of purple: a primary deep purple (#3F1D75), an energetic violet (#8647FD), and a soothing lavender (#B3AEF8). These colors are indicative of creativity and excitement, suitable for their online platform focusing on event ticket sales. The source for this branding information is derived from a visual identity redesign highlighted on eydesign.xyz.
